    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Board board,
            Player[] players,
            int win)
        Defines a game with a board, players, and win condition.
        Parameters:
        board - - board for the game to use
        players - - players that participate in the game
        win - - amount of 'connects' by a player for the game to be won

      • winningMove

        public int[] winningMove(Player player,
                         int condition)
        Checks what the next move for the player would be if there is a winning move.
        Parameters:
        player - - player to check move for
        condition - - win condition of the game
        Returns:
        coordinates of a winning move or {-1,-1} if none
